channel.title: Cyberus
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i524.photobucket.com/albums/cc330/Rabrg/Cyberus.jpg[/img]
[b]Cyberus[/b] is going to be a [b]317[/b] or [b]474[/b] server based off of [b]Hyperion[/b]. If the server is [b]317[/b], we will not be adding any new data to the cache, like Chaotic maul, Bandos godsword, Dragon claws, etc. But because we wouldn't do that doesn't mean its going to be a OSRemake. (As in were not going to make the home Lumbridge and it takes a couple of hours to get to 50 strength.) The server will be [b]economic[/b] and well balanced. Players will have a large variety of things to do, and will never get bored.
[b]Languages[/b] were going to use:
XML ([i]Our database language[/i]) JScript ([i]Our scripting language[/i]) Java ([i]Of course[/i])
I think I need proof of development so I just dumped all 377 items (I can easily dump all 474s, I could dump all 614s if I wanted to) in this format:
[left][code] <list> <ITEM ID="4151"> <STATS NAME="Abyssal_whip" A_STAB="0" A_SLASH="82" A_CRUSH="0" A_MAGE="0" A_RANGE="0" D_STAB="0" D_SLASH="0" D_CRUSH="0" D_MAGE="0" D_RANGE="0" STRENGTH="82" RANGE_STENGTH="0" PRAY="0" MAGE_STRENGTH="0" TRADEABLE="true" HIGH_ALCH="72000" LOW_ALCH="4200" WEIGHT="0.45" EXAMINE="A weapon from the Abyss." /> </ITEM> </list>[/code][/left]
If you would like to apply or want more info, post here, send me a PM, or contact me at: Chiddix@live.com[/center]

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:12, topic:371853”][quote author=Aeronity link=topic=467922.msg3421034#msg3421034 date=1291514467]
Um, InnovationX? And then you got your ass handed from that project, hence why I said “go back to”.
[/quote]I don’t own InnovationX, nor did I choose to base it off BattleScape. I released the 474.[/quote]

I know that. You were programming for InnovationX until Ryan kicked you out. (amirite?). And, yea, you released the 474 that’s based off of Scull’s server. Which you asked me to program with you lol.

(Bump)

Still looking for one or two more programmers.

The project thread is at:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“julesrules11, post:10, topic:371853”]I would like to apply for staff as mod or anything you need me to be.

Im well known of the private servers people playing them for 4 years now and can do make web pages/chats/forums little bit of codeing.

Im 18 years old not little kid begging to be mod or admin.

I would never think of my self different from any old normal member i would never use my power if anyway possible.

Im nice and kind and can help whenever ingame and out of game.and im hard worker.also i added you on msn[/quote]
I won’t be needing staff (Not counting web/server developers and graphic designers) for a longg time.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:7, topic:371853”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=467922.msg3421030#msg3421030 date=1291514137]

I’ll help. But I must first say I have very little experience with hyperion so I would be learning as we go along.
[/quote]Neither does he

Oh please. Go back to your battle scape. You’re probably mad because I didn’t want to program the server that you bought from Scull.
[/quote]What are you talking about BattleScape?

I’m using Hyperion.

He’s just stupid Canownyoueazy; it’s not like he’d make a huge addition to FlareSoft anyways.[/quote]

Now who the hell are you? If I don’t know your skills at all I doubt you know mine.

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:8, topic:371853”][quote author=Aeronity link=topic=467922.msg3421034#msg3421034 date=1291514467]
Um, InnovationX? And then you got your ass handed from that project.

Good luck.

By the way, I wouldn’t recommend arguing with the mentally ill.[/quote]

Thanks, and eh, yea, I probably shouldn’t. I could probably get some brain damage myself doing that.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyberus
item.dc:creator: @Aeronity Aeronity
item.description:
@Aeronity wrote:

[center]

Cyberus is going to be a 317 or 474 server based off of Hyperion. If the server is 317, we will not be adding any new data to the cache, like Chaotic maul, Bandos godsword, Dragon claws, etc. But because we wouldn’t do that doesn’t mean its going to be a OSRemake. (As in were not going to make the home Lumbridge and it takes a couple of hours to get to 50 strength.) The server will be economic and well balanced. Players will have a large variety of things to do, and will never get bored.

Languages were going to use:

XML (Our database language)
JScript (Our scripting language)
Java (Of course)

I think I need proof of development so I just dumped all 377 items (I can easily dump all 474s, I could dump all 614s if I wanted to) in this format:

[left] <list> <ITEM ID="4151"> <STATS NAME="Abyssal_whip" A_STAB="0" A_SLASH="82" A_CRUSH="0" A_MAGE="0" A_RANGE="0" D_STAB="0" D_SLASH="0" D_CRUSH="0" D_MAGE="0" D_RANGE="0" STRENGTH="82" RANGE_STENGTH="0" PRAY="0" MAGE_STRENGTH="0" TRADEABLE="true" HIGH_ALCH="72000" LOW_ALCH="4200" WEIGHT="0.45" EXAMINE="A weapon from the Abyss." /> </ITEM> </list>[/left]

If you would like to apply or want more info, post here, send me a PM, or contact me at: Chiddix@live.com[/center]
